channel.title: Troubleshooting on Das Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Das Blog

item.title: Understanding the structure of docx files: XML schema, file and folder organization, and common errors
item.description: Microsoft Word is one of the most used word processing tools worldwide. Word files are saved in the .docx file format, which is an open standard for storing documents. The .docx format uses XML, or Extensible Markup Language, to store text, images, and formatting information in a structured way.
